  <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1">
    <Sequence.Variables>
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)" Name="accDict" />
    </Sequence.Variables>
    <If Condition="[dtResultStructure Is Nothing]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_3">
      <If.Then>
        <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_7">
          <Assign.To>
            <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtResultStructure]</OutArgument>
          </Assign.To>
          <Assign.Value>
            <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[New DataTable()]</InArgument>
          </Assign.Value>
        </Assign>
      </If.Then>
    </If>
    <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_1">
      <Assign.To>
        <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtOutput]</OutArgument>
      </Assign.To>
      <Assign.Value>
        <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtResultStructure.Clone()]</InArgument>
      </Assign.Value>
    </Assign>
    <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_8">
      <Assign.To>
        <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[accDict]</OutArgument>
      </Assign.To>
      <Assign.Value>
        <InArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[New Dictionary(Of String, System.Data.DataRowView)]</InArgument>
      </Assign.Value>
    </Assign>
    <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtAcc]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_3">
      <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
      </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
      <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">
        <ActivityAction.Argument>
          <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="aRow" />
        </ActivityAction.Argument>
        <If Condition="[Not accDict.ContainsKey(aRow("Household_ID").ToString)]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_4">
          <If.Then>
            <InvokeMethod sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="InvokeMethod_1" MethodName="Add">
              <InvokeMethod.TargetObject>
                <InArgument x:TypeArguments="scg:Dictionary(x:String, sd:DataRowView)">[accDict]</InArgument>
              </InvokeMethod.TargetObject>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[aRow("Household_ID").ToString]</InArgument>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">[aRow]</InArgument>
            </InvokeMethod>
          </If.Then>
        </If>
      </ActivityAction>
    </oa:ForEachDataRow>
    <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtKCB]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_4">
      <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
        <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
      </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
      <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">
        <ActivityAction.Argument>
          <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="kRow" />
        </ActivityAction.Argument>
        <If Condition="[accDict.ContainsKey(kRow("Household_ID").ToString)]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_5">
          <If.Then>
            <ou:AddDataRow DataTable="[dtOutput]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="AddDataRow_2" RowData="[{
 kRow("County_Name"),
 kRow("Constituency_Name"),
 kRow("Household_ID"),
 kRow("HHMember_Roster_ID"),
 accDict(kRow("Household_ID").ToString)("First_name")
}]" />
          </If.Then>
        </If>
      </ActivityAction>
    </oa:ForEachDataRow>
    <oa:CommentOut>
      <If Condition="[dtKCB Is Nothing OrElse dtAcc Is Nothing]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_1">
        <If.Then>
          <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_3">
            <Assign.To>
              <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtOutput]</OutArgument>
            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtResultStructure.Clone()]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
        </If.Then>
      </If>
      <sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef>CommentOut_7</sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef>
    </oa:CommentOut>
    <oa:CommentOut>
      <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtKCB]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_2">
        <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
          <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
          <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
        </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
        <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">
          <ActivityAction.Argument>
            <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="kRow" />
          </ActivityAction.Argument>
          <oa:ForEachDataRow DataView="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dtAcc]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachDataRow_1">
            <oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
              <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Index" />
              <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Int32" Default="0" Name="Total" />
            </oa:ForEachDataRow.Variables>
            <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView">
              <ActivityAction.Argument>
                <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataRowView" Name="arow" />
              </ActivityAction.Argument>
              <If Condition="[kRow("Household_ID").ToString = aRow("Household_ID").ToString]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="If_2">
                <If.Then>
                  <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_2">
                    <ou:AddDataRow DataTable="[dtOutput]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="AddDataRow_1" RowData="[{ kRow("County_Name"), kRow("Constituency_Name"), kRow("Household_ID"), kRow("HHMember_Roster_ID"), aRow("First_name") }]" />
                  </Sequence>
                </If.Then>
              </If>
            </ActivityAction>
          </oa:ForEachDataRow>
        </ActivityAction>
      </oa:ForEachDataRow>
      <sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef>CommentOut_8</sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef>
    </oa:CommentOut>
    <oa:CommentOut sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CommentOut_1">
      <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_2">
        <Assign.To>
          <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable">[dtOutput]</OutArgument>
        </Assign.To>
        <Assign.Value>
          <InArgument x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable" xml:space="preserve">[(
From k In dtKCB.AsEnumerable()
Join a In dtAcc.AsEnumerable()
On k("Household_ID").ToString Equals a("Household_ID").ToString
Select dtOutput.LoadDataRow(New Object(){
k("County_Name"),
k("Constituency_Name"),
k("Household_ID"),
k("HHMember_Roster_ID"),
a("First_name")
}, False)
).CopyToDataTable()]</InArgument>
        </Assign.Value>
      </Assign>
    </oa:CommentOut>
    <sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>dw1DOlxFbXB0eS54YW1sAA==</sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>
  </Sequence>
